name: Faceless (itch) (usaagi)
description:
Faceless is a serialized hypertext novel, which means that it's mostly words, some of which you can click on, and it's released in parts over time. It involves a disillusioned graphic designer, powerful demons working for the FBI, and a futuristic beach city in the 90s.

It features:

  • An original story reminiscent of an action-adventure comic book
  • A kickin' original soundtrack composed by the author
  • Philosophical rambling
  • Four whole chapters to read and counting

Current release schedule is every Friday (hopefully).
